verses.text: Hold not thy \w peace|strong="H2790"\w*, O \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of my \w praise|strong="H8416"\w*;

For the \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w* of the \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w* and the \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w* of the \w deceitful|strong="H4820"\w* are \w opened|strong="H6605"\w* against me: they have \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w* against me with a \w lying|strong="H8267"\w* \w tongue|strong="H3956"\w*.\f + \fr 109.2 \ft of the deceitful: Heb. of deceit\f*\f + \fr 109.2 \ft are opened: Heb. have opened themselves\f*
They \w compassed|strong="H5437"\w* me about also with \w words|strong="H1697"\w* of \w hatred|strong="H8135"\w*; and \w fought|strong="H3898"\w* against me without a \w cause|strong="H2600"\w*.
For my \w love|strong="H0160"\w* they are my \w adversaries|strong="H7853"\w*: but I \add give myself unto\add* \w prayer|strong="H8605"\w*.
And they have \w rewarded|strong="H7760"\w* me \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* for \w good|strong="H2896"\w*, and \w hatred|strong="H8135"\w* for my \w love|strong="H0160"\w*.

\w Set|strong="H6485"\w* thou a wicked \w man|strong="H7563"\w* over him: and let \w Satan|strong="H7854"\w* \w stand|strong="H5975"\w* at his right \w hand|strong="H3225"\w*.\f + \fr 109.6 \ft Satan: or, an adversary\f*

When he shall be \w judged|strong="H8199"\w*, let him \w be|strong="H3318"\w* \w condemned|strong="H7563"\w*: and let his \w prayer|strong="H8605"\w* become \w sin|strong="H2401"\w*.\f + \fr 109.7 \ft be condemned: Heb. go out guilty, or, wicked\f*

Let his \w days|strong="H3117"\w* be \w few|strong="H4592"\w*; \add and\add* let \w another|strong="H0312"\w* \w take|strong="H3947"\w* his \w office|strong="H6486"\w*.\f + \fr 109.8 \ft office: or, charge\f*
Let his \w children|strong="H1121"\w* be \w fatherless|strong="H3490"\w*, and his \w wife|strong="H0802"\w* a \w widow|strong="H0490"\w*.

Let his \w children|strong="H1121"\w* be \w continually|strong="H5128"\w* \w vagabonds|strong="H5128"\w*, and \w beg|strong="H7592"\w*: let them \w seek|strong="H1875"\w* \add their bread\add* also out of their desolate \w places|strong="H2723"\w*.
Let the \w extortioner|strong="H5383"\w* \w catch|strong="H5367"\w* all that he hath; and let the \w strangers|strong="H2114"\w* \w spoil|strong="H0962"\w* his \w labour|strong="H3018"\w*.
Let there be none to \w extend|strong="H4900"\w* \w mercy|strong="H2617"\w* unto him: neither let there be any to \w favour|strong="H2603"\w* his fatherless \w children|strong="H3490"\w*.

Let his \w posterity|strong="H0319"\w* be cut \w off|strong="H3772"\w*; \add and\add* in the \w generation|strong="H1755"\w* \w following|strong="H0312"\w* let their \w name|strong="H8034"\w* be blotted \w out|strong="H4229"\w*.

Let the \w iniquity|strong="H5771"\w* of his \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w* be \w remembered|strong="H2142"\w* with the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*; and let not the \w sin|strong="H2403"\w* of his \w mother|strong="H0517"\w* be blotted \w out|strong="H4229"\w*.

Let them be before the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w continually|strong="H8548"\w*, that he may cut \w off|strong="H3772"\w* the \w memory|strong="H2143"\w* of them from the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*.

Because that he \w remembered|strong="H2142"\w* not to \w shew|strong="H6213"\w* \w mercy|strong="H2617"\w*, but \w persecuted|strong="H7291"\w* the \w poor|strong="H6041"\w* and \w needy|strong="H0034"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w*, that he might even \w slay|strong="H4191"\w* the \w broken|strong="H3512"\w* in \w heart|strong="H3824"\w*.

As he \w loved|strong="H0157"\w* \w cursing|strong="H7045"\w*, so let it \w come|strong="H0935"\w* unto him: as he \w delighted|strong="H2654"\w* not in \w blessing|strong="H1293"\w*, so let it be \w far|strong="H7368"\w* from him.

As he \w clothed|strong="H3847"\w* himself with \w cursing|strong="H7045"\w* like as with his \w garment|strong="H4055"\w*, so let it \w come|strong="H0935"\w* into his \w bowels|strong="H7130"\w* like \w water|strong="H4325"\w*, and like \w oil|strong="H8081"\w* into his \w bones|strong="H6106"\w*.\f + \fr 109.18 \ft into his bowels: Heb. within him\f*

Let it be unto him as the \w garment|strong="H0899"\w* \add which\add* \w covereth|strong="H5844"\w* him, and for a \w girdle|strong="H4206"\w* wherewith he is \w girded|strong="H2296"\w* \w continually|strong="H8548"\w*.

\add Let\add* this \add be\add* the \w reward|strong="H6468"\w* of mine \w adversaries|strong="H7853"\w* from the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, and of them that \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* against my \w soul|strong="H5315"\w*.

But \w do|strong="H6213"\w* thou for me, O \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd* the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w*, for thy \w name’s|strong="H8034"\w* sake: because thy \w mercy|strong="H2617"\w* \add is\add* \w good|strong="H2896"\w*, \w deliver|strong="H5337"\w* thou me.
For I \add am\add* \w poor|strong="H6041"\w* and \w needy|strong="H0034"\w*, and my \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* is \w wounded|strong="H2490"\w* \w within|strong="H7130"\w* me.
I am \w gone|strong="H1980"\w* like the \w shadow|strong="H6738"\w* when it \w declineth|strong="H5186"\w*: I am tossed up and \w down|strong="H5287"\w* as the \w locust|strong="H0697"\w*.
My \w knees|strong="H1290"\w* are \w weak|strong="H3782"\w* through \w fasting|strong="H6685"\w*; and my \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w* \w faileth|strong="H3584"\w* of \w fatness|strong="H8081"\w*.
I became also a \w reproach|strong="H2781"\w* unto them: \add when\add* they \w looked|strong="H7200"\w* upon me they \w shaked|strong="H5128"\w* their \w heads|strong="H7218"\w*.
\w Help|strong="H5826"\w* me, O \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* my \w God|strong="H0430"\w*: O \w save|strong="H3467"\w* me according to thy \w mercy|strong="H2617"\w*:
That they may \w know|strong="H3045"\w* that this \add is\add* thy \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*; \add that\add* thou, \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, hast \w done|strong="H6213"\w* it.

Let them \w curse|strong="H7043"\w*, but \w bless|strong="H1288"\w* thou: when they \w arise|strong="H6965"\w*, let them be \w ashamed|strong="H0954"\w*; but let thy \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* \w rejoice|strong="H8055"\w*.

Let mine \w adversaries|strong="H7853"\w* be \w clothed|strong="H3847"\w* with \w shame|strong="H3639"\w*, and let them \w cover|strong="H5844"\w* themselves with their own \w confusion|strong="H1322"\w*, as with a \w mantle|strong="H4598"\w*.

I will \w greatly|strong="H3966"\w* \w praise|strong="H3034"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* with my \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w*; yea, I will \w praise|strong="H1984"\w* him \w among|strong="H8432"\w* the \w multitude|strong="H7227"\w*.

For he shall \w stand|strong="H5975"\w* at the right \w hand|strong="H3225"\w* of the \w poor|strong="H0034"\w*, to \w save|strong="H3467"\w* \add him\add* from those that \w condemn|strong="H8199"\w* his \w soul|strong="H5315"\w*.\f + \fr 109.31 \ft those…: Heb. the judges of\f*
